entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -43.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -43.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -48.4°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 40. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 65 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 65 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
